output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, CMF 11240017 is present at the end of the post. 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate. 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement targeting 100,001-500,000 people. 4. Electoral objective: Yes, the post clearly promotes both: - Parliamentary candidates (which is allowed as that campaign is ongoing) - Marcel Ciolacu as a leader, suggesting Romania's progress depends on his leadership 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly promotional content, not journalistic. 6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication with CMF number.
The post mixes content about: - Infrastructure development (A7 and A8 highways) - Parliamentary elections (which is allowed) - Presidential candidate promotion (which is not allowed after campaign end)
The line "Cu o guvernare social-democrată și Marcel Ciolacu în fruntea țării, România are șansa unui progres pe termen lung" is clearly presidential campaign messaging.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Has official CMF number - Is paid advertisement - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Makes promises about future progress under specific leadership - Uses party resources for promotion
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Pascani, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral in favoarea candidatului prezidential ION-MARCEL CIOLACU dupa incheierea campaniei electorale, prin postarea cu ID 581864764347888 pe facebook. Postarea, efectuata dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, contine mesaje clare de propaganda electorala cum ar fi "Cu o guvernare social-democrată și Marcel Ciolacu în fruntea țării, România are șansa unui progres pe termen lung", are numar CMF 11240017, si este o reclama platita care a ajuns la intre 10.000 si 15.000 de persoane, constituind astfel o clara actiune de propaganda electorala in afara perioadei permise de lege.
